title: Mr.Stream Men's Lightweight Long Sleeved Snap Plaid Western Cowboy Flannel Lined Shirts Jackets
description: NOTE: Please order the size shown in the product description on the left side (not the Amazon size chart), the size information in the product description is accurate.
Classic flannel jacket with Western styling.
It very comfortable to wear relaxing or doing stuff in yard or campsite and for use in all types of outdoor activities from camping and sitting around a fire, taking a walk.
Hand warmer side pockets and 1 inner Pocket with Velcro Seal
